title: The Talk Show: ‘Pinkies on the Semicolon’
content:
The Talk Show

‘Pinkies on the Semicolon’, With John Siracusa

Saturday, 27 February 2021

The state of the Mac, with special guest John Siracusa.

Download MP3.
